channel.title: Hide passwords same as pimpscape servers
channel.description:
Right im going to let other people hoast my server and i need the password Cryption thing
so i can hoast the player files from this computer along with all the config and data files and have just the class files compressed in to a jar for trustfull friends to hoast for me
ty [img]http://sigex.no-ip.org/ad.png[/img] add me, its an image btw so bots dont get my addy -.- and the image is hoasted from this pc so when its terned of it mine not be shown >.< so..
stephen.rayner @ --------- hotmail co!uk
